question: Assalamu Aleikum, Can you please provide a selection of dua's for the Mujahideen with Transliteration and Translation. I am a new Muslim and therefore struggle with Arabic.
answer:
QUESTION
I have heard a dua in the local mosques which goes like "Allahuma ansar mujhideen fi kuli makaan", can you please expand on this. Jazakhallah Khairan for you hard work and may Allah(swt) reward you.
ANSWER


Share:
Allahumma ihdinaa feeman hadayta, Wa'aafinaa feeman aafayta
Wa tawallanaa feeman tawallayta, Wa baarik lanaa feemaa a-atwayta
Wa qinaa sharr maa qadhayta, Innakaa taqdhiy walaa yuqdhaa alayka
Wa inaahoo laa yadhillu man waalayta, Walaa ya-izzu man 'aadayta
Tabaarakta rabbanaa wa ta'aalayta, Nastaghfiruka wa natoobu ilayka
Wa salla llaahu alan nabiyyil kareem
Allaahumma ighfir lanaa wa lilmu'mineena wal mu'minaat wal muslimeena wal
muslimaat
Wa allif bayna quloobihim, wa as-lih dhaata baynihim
Wa-nsurhuma alaa aduwwika wa aduwwihim
Allaahummal anil kafarata lladheema yasuddoona an sabeelika, wa
yukadh-dhiboona rusulika wa yuqaatiloona awliyaa-aka
Allaahumma khaalif bayna kalimatihim wa zalzil aqdaamahum wa anzil bihim
ba-asaka lladhiy laa tarudduhoo anil qawmil mujrimeen

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
